title: Machine Learning vs Deep Learning vs AI
content:
Module 2, Lesson 4: Machine Learning vs Deep Learning vs AI

The Hook

Understanding the hierarchy AI ⊃ ML ⊃ Deep Learning is essential for choosing the right approach for any problem.

The Concept

1. AI: the broadest category

Understanding AI: the broadest category is foundational to this topic. Indian companies and research institutions apply these principles in production AI systems every day.

2. Machine Learning: data-driven subset of AI

Machine Learning: data-driven subset of AI forms the core methodology for practitioners. India's tech ecosystem from Bengaluru to Hyderabad deploys these approaches at scale.

3. Deep Learning: neural-network subset of ML

Deep Learning: neural-network subset of ML is critical for building reliable AI solutions. Top Indian firms like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and startups like Razorpay all leverage these techniques.

4. When to use traditional ML vs deep learning

Mastering When to use traditional ML vs deep learning separates good practitioners from great ones. Apply these concepts on Indian open datasets from data.gov.in to build hands-on expertise.

The Illustration

This lesson covered AI: the broadest category, Machine Learning: data-driven subset of AI, Deep Learning: neural-network subset of ML, and When to use traditional ML vs deep learning. These are the building blocks of machine learning vs deep learning vs ai — master them through practice on real Indian datasets.

quiz.question: What does deep learning automate that traditional ML requires manually?
When should traditional ML be preferred over deep learning?
options: When data is unstructured and very large
When data is tabular, small, and interpretability is required

quiz.question: For which problem is deep learning the BEST choice?
options: Detecting disease from chest X-ray images
Monthly sales forecasting from structured data
Classifying loan applications from form fields
